projects.description: Chronicling my debauchery in front end development.

projects.name: troog
projects.description:
Sync your Trello boards with Google Calendar.

Automatically create Google Calendar events for your Trello cards.

projects.name: WAILto
projects.description: WAILto (or What Am I Listening To) is a way to analyze your music listening. Learn about your own music trends and history.
projects.tech: Node, React, React Hooks API, PostgreSQL, HTML, SCSS

projects.name: outwork
projects.description:
Log your workouts.

Allows mobile-friendly data entry for easy workout tracking.

projects.name: HUB
projects.description:
HUB is your own personal wiki: you can maintain notes, text yourself reminders, and more.

Full markdown and SMS-upload support make HUB a lightweight, easy solution to digital clutter.
projects.tech: Node, React, Webhooks, MongoDB, HTML, CSS

projects.name: orderUp hookUp
projects.description: Find food near you. Optimized for mobile and phone, orderUp hookUp cross-references the Google and Yelp APIs to find nearby restaurants.
projects.tech: JavaScript, Angular 1, Node, Express, HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap.

projects.name: Playlist Parser
projects.description:
Check which of your Spotify playlists contain a given song.

Full authentication with Spotify allows support of public and private playlists.

projects.name: personaList
projects.description: With personaList, you can comment up every song in your Spotify playlist. Pages are dynamically generated with JavaScript to show Spotify API data.
projects.tech: React, React Hooks API, Node, Express, HTML, SCSS, and Gulp.

projects.name: toadstools
projects.description: Toadstools offers widgets for live streamers to display 'now playing' information, countdown timers, etc.
projects.tech: Deno, React, React Hooks, HTML, CSS

projects.name: Practice Buddy
projects.description: Practice Buddy helps you learn musical modes and scales and improve your musicianship. Choose any mode and any starting pitch and start practicing today!
projects.tech: React, JavaScript, ES6, Webpack, HTML, CSS, and CSS Grid.

projects.name: Git Flow
projects.description: Git Flow is an interactive git tutorial that walks users through a git workflow via a step-by-step flowchart.
projects.tech: React, React Router v. 3, JavaScript, ES6, HTML, CSS, SCSS, and Bootstrap.

projects.name: Twitch Tracker
projects.description: Twitch Tracker gives you real time analytics for your Twitch stream. Chat, view count, and viewer names are all pulled from the Twitch API.
